aboutMe Show you about me.
  • Jony Bepary Computer Programmer And a Scented Soul Hello Myself Jony Bepary. And you are now standing on my little blog If you're reading this thread. Then I can say that maybe you have a little bit curious about me.
    Isn't it? So lets start!

    I am a student and a passionate programmer.
    I love coding and writing on my favorite subject on my blog.

    Well, this is all myself in a nutshell. Not so bad as a short brief-intro. But If you think youre not satisfied with this short brief-intro and if you have more time to spare.
    Then please spare me couples of years. So that I can write about myself in a mini-novel called Me & Myself for you guys. And in order to read the rest & full of the legendary Me & Myself novel. You have to wait and pray for me. So The Almighty give me the power, strength, and tolerance to write this novel and achieve the pinnacle of the Excellence.
